creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
text:
Dependency attribute should allow exclude patterns. This would be useful for 
excluding common exception and utility classes which should be in (an) external 
jar(s) referred in ejb-jar manifest's Class-Path -entry. Also, other EJBs' 
classes are also unnecessary bloat since AFAIK, they should be available via the 
EJB classloader.

creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
text:
Dependency should also take a classpath which BCEL should use to locate classes. 
Also, currently <ejbjar>'s classpath seems to be ignored when wlclasspath is 
defined, and there is absolutely no clarity about what classpath ejbc will use!
